entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9707] It is expected that FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome with a value of 843,869,573,000 reported in the network role http://www.bbva.com/role/ConsolidatedStatementsOfFinancialPosition should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, FinancialAssets with the dimension ifrs-full:CategoriesOfFinancialAssetsAxis = ifrs-full:FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeCategoryMember and a reported value of 841,884,579,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.bbva.com/role/FinancialInstrumentsRisksSummaryOfCreditRiskExposureOfLoansAndAdvancesDetails. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome fact are:
Period : 2023-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : ARS Decimals of FinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome : -3 Decimals of FinancialAssets : -3 Rule version: 26.0.9 - d595174d20f.htm 38429
